activities: TIY Academy, LLC. collects, uses and processes employee, supplier, alumni, student and prospective student data for the following purposes: Compensation administration, including incentive plan administration and compensation analysis; Finance and accounting related activities; Reviewing applications and enrolling prospective students; Administering and maintaining the student relationship; Providing products and services; Conducting marketing and promotions; Maintaining business records; Contracting; Sales; IT Support, IT hosting; Disaster recovery; Helpline investigations and other investigations; In connection with the contemplated or actual reorganization, merger, acquisition, financing, securitization, insuring, sale or other disposal of all or part of our business or assets; Project management; Legal compliance activities, and; Other legitimate business purposes.
personaldata: Employee, supplier, alumni, student and prospective student data.
